ygData.subject: Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: Why would you want to play AE songs?  What songs are you talking about? If you are in Guk without an enchanter, you are probably the person who will need to do
ygData.messageBody:
Why would you want to play AE songs? What songs are you talking about?

If you are in Guk without an enchanter, you are probably the person who will
need to do crowd control. So, if (or more like when) you get more than one
mob, you will be doing Pixie strike. If you have an enchanter, you will not
want to use AE and break the mobs out of their messed states (ok, Largos
does not break enchanter mez so that is one option.)

In lower Guk, I'd think you would want to buff your tanks: chant and
celerity or anthem and elemental if you are fighting casters. If you are in
a situation with multiple mobs and no crowd control, that is a problem. And
playing area effect damage songs is not the solution.

Sylly SongSynger
Bardette of 45 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

> From: joseph <jmounts@...>
> On a side note, I've always been scared to death to play any area songs in
> lower guk. Is it indeed safe (well, as safe as one can be there) to do
so?
> My impression is that I would piss off every unseen monster either above
> or below me, getting my group killed. Hehe, only area song i have ~ever~
> done in there was Screech in Exe area, when my group got itself into a
> tight situation, and needed to evac.
>
> Elwe Lay
> 36 Songs
> Kinship of Valor
> Karana
